text: Early Man is a 2018 British stop motion animated sports comedy movie directed by Nick Park, the creator of Wallace & Gromit, written by Mark Burton and James Higginson, and starring the voices of Eddie Redmayne, Tom Hiddleston, Maisie Williams and Timothy Spall. The movie follows a tribe of primitive Stone Age valley dwellers, who have to defend their land from bronze-using invaders in a football match. The movie premiered on 20 January 2018 at the BFI Southbank cinema. Released theatrically on 26 January 2018, the movie received generally positive reviews from critics, who praised the animation, voice acting and humour, although some deemed it inferior to previous Aardman works. The movie underperformed at the box office, only grossing $54 million against a budget of $50 million. ==Cast== * Eddie Redmayne as Dug * Tom Hiddleston as Lord Nooth * Maisie Williams as Goona * Timothy Spall as Chief Bobnar * Miriam Margolyes as Queen Oofeefa * Kayvan Novak as Dino and Jurgend * Rob Brydon as Brian, Bryan, Message Bird and Gonad the Gaul * Richard Ayoade as Treebor * Selina Griffiths as Magma * Johnny Vegas as Asbo * Mark Williams as Barry * Gina Yashere as Gravelle * Richard Webber as Grubup * Simon Greenall as Eemak and Thongo * Nick Park as Hognob ==Other websites== * * * at British Comedy Guide Category:2018 comedy movies Category:Sports comedy movies Category:2018 animated movies Category:2018 fantasy movies Category:British animated movies Category:Clay animation movies
title: Early Man
